citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:57 PM on 15-
JUNE-21. Inspectors attempted to make contact with the licensee via phone. Contact was made with an individual at the
premise who confirmed that no one was available for inspection at that time.
Additional Inspectors:
SHANNON SEBERA, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
